attributes.action: We need to make drastic changes to THE GRAND NATIONAL horse race.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a nation of animal lovers.... AREN'T WE? How can we sit back and enjoy watching these poor horses race and jump these fences until their hearts could burst. And, then be whipped fanatically to reach the finish. Let us enjoy this race which I am sure the horses would enjoy with smaller and less fences. Please, sign this petition and let our voices be heard on behalf of the horses for their health, care and welfare Thankyou.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
